definition: a war measure that isolates some area of importance to the enemy, to impose a blockade on
details:
noun
- a war measure that isolates some area of importance to the enemy
= synonyms: encirclement
- prevents access or progress
verb
- to impose a blockade on
= example: to impose a blockade on
= synonyms: seal off
- to obstruct access to
= example: to obstruct access to
= synonyms: block off
- to render unsuitable for passage
= example: to render unsuitable for passage
= synonyms: stop, bar, barricade, block off, block up
- to hinder or prevent the progress or accomplishment of
= example: to hinder or prevent the progress or accomplishment of
= synonyms: block
